description: The "synthetic.classrooms" table appears to represent entities related to physical or virtual classrooms within an educational context, identifiable by a unique "room_id" serving as the primary key. As there are no foreign keys or referencing tables, this table is currently isolated and does not interact with other data entities within the dataset. The absence of sample data and column details prevents further insight into its specific attributes and functionality in the data model.

columns.name: room_id
columns.description: This column uniquely identifies each classroom within the system. It automatically assigns a sequential number to every new classroom entry, ensuring each has a distinct identifier.

columns.name: room_number
columns.description: This column represents the unique identifier assigned to each classroom within a facility. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: capacity
columns.description: This column likely represents the maximum number of individuals that a classroom can accommodate. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: has_projector
columns.description: Indicates whether a classroom is equipped with a projector, allowing for enhanced presentation capabilities. The presence of a projector is not mandatory, as it can be either available or not.

columns.name: has_whiteboard
columns.description: Indicates whether the classroom is equipped with a whiteboard, with the assumption that classrooms are typically equipped unless specified otherwise. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: is_available
columns.description: Indicates whether the classroom is currently ready for use, with a default assumption that it is ready unless specified otherwise.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Represents the date and time when a classroom record was initially created in the system. The exact purpose is unclear from the available data.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The column records the date and time when a classroom record was last modified. It is automatically set to the current timestamp if not manually updated.

indexes.index_definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX classrooms_pkey ON synthetic.classrooms USING btree (room_id)
